content: SH hinge connectors Seismic hinge connectors for bracing the strut channels against lateral loads ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features For use with Hilti channel profiles,concrete anchors, bolted to structural steel Bolt conforms to ANSI B18.2.1 Applications For use with Hilti strut profiles, concrete anchors, bolted to structural steel or threaded drop rods to brace against lateral loads ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Carbon steel Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Base material type: Steel Technical Data | Material composition | Carbon steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Base material type | Steel | Load range | Medium duty ### ITEMS- 369714 - Seismic hinge, base/hanger half 3/8 - Package Size 10 pc - 333308 - Seismic hinge, base/hanger half 1/2 - Package Size 10 pc - 369715 - Seismic hinge, base/hanger half 5/8 - Package Size 10 pc - 369716 - Seismic hinge, base/hanger half 3/4 - Package Size 10 pc - 333309 - Seismic hinge, strut half w/bolt & nut - Package Size 10 pc
